subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kristaps Porzingis had 17 points and 10 rebounds as the Knicks stopped a four-game skid by beating Philadelphia, which was coming off its first win of the season after 18 straight defeats.
snippet: Kristaps Porzingis had 17 points and 10 rebounds as the Knicks stopped a four-game skid by beating Philadelphia, which was coming off its first win of the season after 18 straight defeats.
